fields.headline: For the record
fields.bodyText: Jamie Murray, brother of Andy, has not won two grand slam titles playing doubles with John Peers, as we said. Jamie and Peers have partnered unsuccessfully in two finals; Jamie has won two titles with Bruno Soares; and Peers has won one with Henri Kontinen (“Staying power of Murray and López rolling back the years”, 23 June, Sport, page 2). Write to the Readers’ Editor, the Observer, York Way, London N1 9GU, email observer.readers@observer.co.uk, tel 020 3353 4736
